caption.title: PANTHER protein class differentially expressed in P7 Tgfbr2;ScxCre mutant cells compared with P7 wild-type tenocytes.
caption.p: A complete list of differentially expressed genes (≥2 fold change, adjusted p<0.05) used for the analysis is available in Supplementary file 2.

td.italic: Pdgfrl, Col6a3, Kdelr3, Col6a1, Kdelr2, Itgbl1, Ssc5d, Col6a2, Ssr4, Col12a1, Matn4
Sdc1, Wisp1, Sparc, Mfap4, Sema3b, Angptl2, Tgfbi
Sec13, Kdelr3, Copz2, Kdelr2, Rabac1, Lman1
Sdc1, Crtap, Clec11a, P3h3, Sparc, P3h4
Ndn, Eif3f, Rpl39, Rpl36a, Rpl3, Rpl9-ps6, Rpl22l1, Rps27, Rps4x, Cirbp, Rps19, Eif3e, Rps18, Rps5, Junb
Fstl1, Dbi, Sfrp2, Ctsb, Serpine2, Serping1, Igfbp3, Igfbp4
Gsn, Map1lc3b, Tuba1b, Arpc1b, Emp1, Tubb5
